SELECT A.WEEK, NVL(B.TOTALQTY, 0) CNT, NVL(B.TOTALS, 0) ATOTAL FROM ( SELECT LEVEL WEEK, 0 DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) A, ( SELECT WEEK, SUM(O_QTY) TOTALQTY, SUM(TOTAL) TOTALS FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT O.S_ID, O.O_DATE, TO_CHAR(O_DATE, 'D') WEEK, OD.O_QTY, O.TOTAL, OD.OP_DNUM, OD.M_NUM FROM ORDER_DETAILS OD, MENU M, ORDERS O
OD.O_NUM = O.O_NUM AND OD.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND O.S_ID = #{sId} AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS NOT IN ('C4','C0','C6') AND OD.CA_NUM NOT IN ('CAOP','CAHT','CAIC') AND
O_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+1)-TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D') AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+1)-TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D') + 7 )
O_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE+1)-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+1)-TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') + 7 )
GROUP BY WEEK ) B WHERE A.WEEK = B.WEEK(+) ORDER BY A.WEEK

SELECT A.WEEK, NVL(B.TOTALQTY, 0) CNT, NVL(B.TOTALS, 0) ATOTAL FROM ( SELECT LEVEL WEEK, 0 DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) A, ( SELECT WEEK, SUM(O_QTY) TOTALQTY, SUM(TOTAL) TOTALS FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT O.S_ID, O.O_DATE, TO_CHAR(O_DATE, 'MM') WEEK, OD.O_QTY, O.TOTAL, OD.OP_DNUM, OD.M_NUM FROM ORDER_DETAILS OD, MENU M, ORDERS O
OD.O_NUM = O.O_NUM AND OD.M_NUM = M.M_NUM AND O.S_ID = #{sId} AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS NOT IN ('C4','C0','C6') AND OD.CA_NUM NOT IN ('CAOP','CAHT','CAIC')
AND TO_CHAR(O_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}),'YYYY') )
AND TO_CHAR(O_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') )
GROUP BY WEEK ) B WHERE A.WEEK = B.WEEK(+)
ORDER BY A.WEEK

SELECT WEEK , SUM(O_QTY) CNT , SUM(TOTAL) ATOTAL FROM (SELECT DISTINCT OD.OP_DNUM, S_ID , O_DATE, O_QTY, TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY') WEEK, TOTAL FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_DETAILS OD ON O.O_NUM = OD.O_NUM WHERE O.DELIVERY_STATUS NOT IN ('C4','C0','C6') AND OD.CA_NUM NOT IN ('CAOP','CAHT','CAIC') ) WHERE S_ID = #{sId} GROUP BY WEEK

SELECT AB.M_NAME, SUM(AB.O_QTY) CNT, SUM(AB.M_PRICE*AB.O_QTY) ATOTAL FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT OD.OP_DNUM ,O.S_ID, OD.O_QTY, O.TOTAL ,OD.OP_DNUM , OD.M_NUM , M.M_NAME, M.M_PRICE FROM MENU M JOIN ORDER_DETAILS OD ON M.M_NUM = OD.M_NUM JOIN ORDERS O ON O.O_NUM = OD.O_NUM WHERE M.S_ID = #{sId} AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS NOT IN ('C4','C0','C6') AND OD.CA_NUM NOT IN ('CAOP','CAHT','CAIC') ) AB GROUP BY AB.M_NAME ORDER BY CNT DESC

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING(CD.TM1),1,'토탈',CD.TM1||'~'||CD.TM2) WEEK , NVL(SUM(AB.CNT),0) CNT , NVL(SUM(AB.TOTAL),0) ATOTAL FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(KIN.O_DATE ,'HH24') TM , SUM(KIN.O_QTY) CNT , SUM(KIN.TOTAL) TOTAL FROM ( select DISTINCT O.O_NUM , O.O_DATE , O.TOTAL ,OD.OP_DNUM ,OD.M_NUM ,OD.O_QTY FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_DETAILS OD ON O.O_NUM = OD.O_NUM JOIN MENU M ON M.M_NUM = OD.M_NUM
O_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+1/(24*60)/60 AND O_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+(23/24)+(59/(24*60))+(59/(24*60)/60)
O_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)+1/(24*60)/60 AND O_DATE <= TRUNC(SYSDATE)+(23/24)+(59/(24*60))+(59/(24*60)/60)
AND M.S_ID = #{sId} AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS NOT IN ('C4','C0','C6') AND OD.CA_NUM NOT IN ('CAOP','CAHT','CAIC')
) KIN group by TO_CHAR(KIN.O_DATE ,'HH24') )AB , ( SELECT LPAD(LEVEL + 9, 2, '0') TM1 , LPAD(LEVEL + 10, 2, '0') TM2 FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 14 ) CD WHERE CD.TM1 = AB.TM(+) GROUP BY ROLLUP((CD.TM1, CD.TM2)) ORDER BY CD.TM1
